EvidenceRequest.Name: Types of evidences for participation in a criminal organisation conviction.
EvidenceRequest.Remarks: A combination of different types of Evidences captured from e-Certis can be used.

Criterion.cccev:Name: Participation in a criminal organisation
Criterion.cccev:Description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for participation in a criminal organisation, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA of 24 October 2008 on the fight against organised crime (OJ L 300, 11.11.2008, p. 42).

cccev:Concept.cccev:Description: Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability (Self-Cleaning)?
Length of the period of exclusion

EvidenceRequest.Name: Types of evidences for the general average turnover.
EvidenceRequest.Remarks: A combination of different types of Evidences captured from e-Certis is used.

Criterion.cccev:Name: Average yearly turnover
Criterion.cccev:Description: Its average yearly turnover for the number of years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows:
Criterion.cccev:WeightingConsiderationDescription: This is a multistage Procedure. The same weight will be used in subsequent selection stages.

EvidenceType.dct:Description: See file case 2018-01-02/1234. Description and date of the conviction.
